Name: Weihnachtslieder von Komponistinnen / Christmas Carols by women composers
Notes: The first volume of the new series in the Furore Verlag 'Christmas Carols by Women Composers' contains nine atmospheric, stylistically and musically different, international Christmas carols for mezzo-soprano and piano by women composers of the 19th and 20th centuries. The texts are predominantly in German, but an English, a Lithuanian and a Norwegian song are also included. The composers were influenced by the literature of the 13th to 20th centuries, which is clearly reflected in the different settings.
Long Description: The first volume of the new series in the Furore Verlag 'Christmas Carols by Women Composers' contains nine atmospheric, stylistically and musically different, international Christmas carols for mezzo-soprano and piano by women composers of the 19th and 20th centuries. The texts are predominantly in German, but an English, a Lithuanian and a Norwegian song are also included. The composers were influenced by the literature of the 13th to 20th centuries, which is clearly reflected in the different settings.
Short Description: Christmas Carols by women composers for mezzo-soprano and piano
